i like going to the moves.

participant_2.background:
I'd rather not disclose my family's occupations.
I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.
I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
i wish i didn t have to work.
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's going well, thanks! I'm a bit tired from work but I'm looking forward to the weekend.
Oh, that's good! What kind of work do you do?
Oh wow, that's so cool! I love cake! I'm not very good at making it myself, though.
It's actually not as hard as you think! I'm sure you could do it if you tried.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime! I'm sure it would be fun.
It is! And it's really rewarding to see the look on people's faces when they see their wedding cake for the first time.
That's so true! I bet you've made a lot of people happy with your cakes.
I hope so! I love making people happy.
You sound like a really great person.
Well, I'm glad you're having a good day! I'm going to go watch a movie now. Have a great weekend!
